alert.note: Alert for Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 26 at 6:21AM PST until December 27 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 70 mph expected. * WHERE...Coast Range of Northwest Oregon and Central Coast Range of Western Oregon. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will likely blow down some trees and power lines. Scattered power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will be lighter in sheltered Coast Range valleys.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Central Coast Range of Western Oregon; Coast Range of Northwest Oregon
